name: Cosmic Cleaner
description:
This game is free. You can download it right now! If you need more convincing though...

Things in the game:
- Destroy enemies to increase your score
- Avoid hitting enemies with your ships boost
- Collect powerups to change your weapon
- Pickup energy from enemies to restore your shield

Things NOT in the game:
- Rogue-lite elements
- Romance options
- Meta-progression
- "Pet the dog" feature (I'm sorry)
- Skill Trees
- Credits (i'm literally just a guy)

Anyway thanks for the support :)

Follow me on my socials

@CRUSTSLICE
